props.name: animationSpeed
props.description: Controls the animation speed of the button (refer to linked documentation for available options).

props.name: ariaLabel
props.description: Text for screen readers describing the button's purpose. Defaults to the label value.

props.name: href
props.description: URL for the button to link to. If undefined, it acts as a regular button without navigation.

props.name: preload
props.description: Fetches the linked page content in the background, specified by the href prop, to improve perceived performance during navigation.

props.name: rounded
props.description: Controls the button's corner curvature (refer to linked documentation for available options).

props.name: shadow
props.description: Defines the button's shadow style (refer to SHADOW documentation for available options).

props.name: size
props.description: Controls the button's size (refer to BUTTON_SIZE documentation for available options).

props.name: type
props.description: Defines the HTML button type (button, submit for forms, reset for forms).

dynamicProps.name: externalLink
dynamicProps.description: Adds an arrow to the button to indicate it leads to another website (requires 'href' to be set).

dynamicProps.name: active
dynamicProps.description: Enables active state of a button on page load.

dynamicProps.name: outline
dynamicProps.description: Use it to create a outline button.

slots.name: beforeLabel
slots.description: Display any content before the Label.

slots.name: label
slots.description: Display the main content of the button.

slots.name: afterLabel
slots.description: Display any content after the Label.
